title: Paul Shaw
content:
American, born 1955.

Type designer, calligrapher, letterer and educator.

Together with [Peter Bain](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904160255/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Peter%20Bain), curated the 1998 [Blackletter: Type and National Identity](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904160255/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Blackletter%3A%20Type%20and%20National%20Identity) exhibition at the [Cooper Union](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904160255/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cooper%20Union).

Typefaces: Bermuda, Donatello, Goteborg, Kolo, Stockholm, and Uppsala for [LetterPerfect](http://web.archive.org/web/20140904160255/http:/typophile.com/wiki/LetterPerfect).
